Description :
  Ravensword: Shadowlands - a huge fantasy world with amazing creatures and landmark events. First of all is necessary to touch dazzling graphics and at least qualitative physics - these two components make this one of the most RPGs the best in its genre!

Features:
Variety inhabitants - dinosaurs, giant spiders, goblins, giants, etc.
Variety of weapons - swords, crossbows, hammers, bows, axes, etc.
Magic components - magic potions, runes, the ability to be invisible.
Variety of items for use.
Bright the world.
Many tasks and quests.
View from the first and third person.
Original Motion Picture Soundtrack.
